name: UpdateCloudWorkloadSecurityAgentRule
description:
Update a specific cloud workload security agent rule.

Use this tool to update a particular security agent rule for cloud workloads. This should only be used for the Government (US1-FED) site and returns the updated agent rule object upon success.

parameters.name: agent_rule_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the agent rule to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Agent rule

parameters.name: agent_rule_definition
parameters.description: The new definition of the agent rule, including actions, constraints, and metadata.

filter.description: SECL expression used to target the container to apply the action on

hash.description: An empty object indicating the hash action

signal.description: Supported signals for the kill system call

kill.description: Kill system call applied on the container matching the rule

image_tag.description: The image tag of the metadata action

service.description: The service of the metadata action

short_image.description: The short image of the metadata action

metadata.description: The metadata action applied on the scope matching the rule

append.description: Whether the value should be appended to the field.

default_value.description: The default value of the set action

expression.description: The expression of the set action.

field.description: The field of the set action

inherited.description: Whether the value should be inherited.

name.description: The name of the set action

scope.description: The scope of the set action.

size.description: The size of the set action.

ttl.description: The time to live of the set action.

value.description: The value of the set action

set.description: The set action applied on the scope matching the rule

actions.description: The array of actions the rule can perform if triggered

agent_version.description: Constrain the rule to specific versions of the Datadog Agent

blocking.description: The blocking policies that the rule belongs to

description.description: The description of the Agent rule

disabled.description: The disabled policies that the rule belongs to

enabled.description: Whether the Agent rule is enabled

expression.description: The SECL expression of the Agent rule

monitoring.description: The monitoring policies that the rule belongs to

policy_id.description: The ID of the policy where the Agent rule is saved

product_tags.description: The list of product tags associated with the rule

attributes.description: Update an existing Cloud Workload Security Agent rule

id.description: The ID of the Agent rule

type.description: The type of the resource, must always be `agent_rule`

data.description: Object for a single Agent rule

value_schema.description: New definition of the agent rule

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
